title: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268 - Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories build 200205291235
OB: Open the about dialog. Observe: There is a main image.
EB: It should have found it in the NL-specific subdirectory.
SR:
1. Start Eclipse. 
2. Delete the file located at <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif>. 
3. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>. Change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to: aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif. 
4. Edit the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini>. Change the value of the 'aboutImage' property to: aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif. 
5. Open the about dialog.
